Token.Abstract: PWCore implements core functionality used in all MaaS modules. All MaaS modules have a PWCore dependency.
Initializes PWCore and all associated MaaS modules. This method should be called inside application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions: before you do anything else.

Parameter.Name: applicationID
Parameter.Abstract: You can find your Application ID in the MaaS portal.

Parameter.Name: accessKey
Parameter.Abstract: A unique key that identifies the client making the request. You can find your Access Key in the MaaS portal.

Parameter.Name: signatureKey
Parameter.Abstract: A unique key that is used to sign requests. The signature is used to both check request authorization as well as data integrity. You can find your Signature Key in the MaaS portal.

Token.Abstract: This method has been deprecated. Use setApplicationID:accessKey:signatureKey: instead.

Parameter.Name: applicationID
Parameter.Abstract: You can find your Application ID in the MaaS portal.

Parameter.Name: accessKey
Parameter.Abstract: A unique key that identifies the client making the request. You can find your Access Key in the MaaS portal.

Parameter.Name: signatureKey
Parameter.Abstract: A unique key that is used to sign requests. The signature is used to both check request authorization as well as data integrity. You can find your Signature Key in the MaaS portal.

Parameter.Name: encryptionKey
Parameter.Abstract: A unique encryption key this is no longer required. set empty string.

Token.Abstract: This method registers the module and its version.

Parameter.Name: moduleName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the dependent module to be registered.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: The completion block to be called.

Token.Abstract: Returns a dictionary of registered modules.
Returns version number for a registered module.

Parameter.Name: moduleName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the dependent module to be registered.
